title: WWE Superstar Xavier Woods Co-Hosts - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.21.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 15% off your first order at http://thirdlove.com/games

Up Up Down Down's Austin Creed joins Greg to talk about the disc-less Xbox One, Wal-Mart getting into streaming games, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:23 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:32 - Disc-less Xbox One S Sighted?
00:12:41 - Wal-Mart Wants to Stream Games?
00:18:43 - Metro Slays on Epic Store
00:22:06 - “What could Epic possibly be offering if they can convince a publisher to switch their release from Steam to the Epic Store?” - Constantine
00:27:16 - MK Beta
00:29:54 - “Did you see the Mortal Kombat 11 Kotal Kahn reveal trailer that dropped yesterday?” - Black Jack
00:35:40 - Game Developers Choice Awards
00:38:45 - Out today
00:41:00 -  Robinhood
00:42:00 -  Thirdlove
Reader mail   -
00:43:17 - “Is there another way you would like to see WWE represented in the industry?” - Daniel Summers
00:49:42 - “What I haven't struck yet is a good balance of being able to game on the road, working out, and getting all work I need to get done, finished.” - The Nano Biologist
00:53:20 - “With Microsoft playing nice with Nintendo and bringing a previously, console exclusive game, to the switch, will Sony follow??” - The Hungarian Sausage
00:56:17 - Squad Up: lowkienan - PS4 - MantisMD94 - Division 2
00:57:26 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg & Amanda Farough
